curriculum_identification.title: Digital Sustainability Consultancy
curriculum_identification.pathway_position: Foundation level in Level 6 Diploma in Digital Sustainability Consultancy

role_profile.title: Digital Sustainability Consultant
role_profile.description: Advises organisations, especially SMEs, on applying digital sustainability solutions.
role_profile.professional_context: This curriculum prepares learners to provide professional consulting services and advisory support for digital sustainability transformations in diverse organisational contexts. Graduates will develop expertise in sustainability assessment methodologies, solution design frameworks, and client engagement strategies. They typically work with SMEs and mid-sized organisations to design and implement sustainability strategies, providing expert guidance on digital tools and methodologies that support environmental objectives.

competence_frameworks_alignment.framework_note: Learning outcomes are mapped directly to GreenComp and e-CF framework descriptors

target_audience: Professionals seeking to develop consulting expertise for sustainability advisory roles with SMEs and organisations requiring transformation support
learning_approach: EQF Level 6 professional development programme with 10.0 ECTS, combining theoretical knowledge with practical application through structured learning and standardised work-based learning integration.

assessment_framework.rationale: Consultancy programmes establish core competences in client engagement and solution development
assessment_framework.wbl_component: Real client engagement and solution implementation support

employer_engagement.feedback_systems: Regular employer feedback on learning outcomes

quality_assurance.monitoring_systems: Regular quality monitoring of WBL delivery

flexible_learning_pathways.modular_design: Learning units designed for flexible recombination
flexible_learning_pathways.competence_catalog: Integrated with competence-based learning unit catalog
flexible_learning_pathways.pathway_flexibility: Multiple entry and exit points available

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Core sustainability concepts and their intersection with technology systems for digital professionals

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Critically evaluate solution design frameworks in introduction to digital sustainability within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Innovate solution architecture design in introduction to digital sustainability to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Lead initiatives in consulting delivery responsibilities for introduction to digital sustainability while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.

learning_units.pathway_guidance: This learning unit forms part of the Foundation level in Level 6 Diploma in Digital Sustainability Consultancy

dual_education_integration.mentor_support: Workplace mentor assigned for practical guidance
dual_education_integration.assessment_workplace: Workplace-based assessment comprising 40.0% of total assessment

catalog_reference.name: Introduction to Digital Sustainability
catalog_reference.description: Core sustainability concepts and their intersection with technology systems for digital professionals

stackability.horizontal_stacking: Can combine with other EQF 5 learning units
stackability.vertical_stacking: Can progress to EQF 6 advanced learning units

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Evaluate organizational sustainability performance against relevant benchmarks

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Formulate implementation roadmapping for sustainability assessment and benchmarking within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Transform implementation facilitation of sustainability assessment and benchmarking to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Drive change in solution implementation leadership in sustainability assessment and benchmarking while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.

learning_units.pathway_guidance: This learning unit forms part of the Foundation level in Level 6 Diploma in Digital Sustainability Consultancy

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Develop consulting best practices in sustainability frameworks and standards within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Optimise advisory service delivery for sustainability frameworks and standards to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Take accountability for advisory relationship management for sustainability frameworks and standards while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.
